testcase.name: Twitter class should fetch the tweets

failure.message: 401:Authentication credentials (https://dev.twitter.com/pages/auth) were missing or incorrect. Ensure that you have set valid consumer key/secret, access token/secret, and the system clock is in sync. message - Could not authenticate you. code - 32
